title: "Caroline" from Paperless Post
content:
Does anyone know what the "caroline" font is on Paperless Post?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725133007im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Caroline_4752.png)
author: jiden

comments.content:
Your sample is very small...  
Assuming that some serifs are not visible (or it's a bit emboldened) it looks close to **[Cochin Archaic](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725133007/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Scriptorium-Fonts&ffam=CochinArchaic%20-%20Regular&fid=2c882f832d23dc2d6aa56fb09fbd3104&fsize=60&text=Caroline&wrap=2)** by Scriptorium Fonts
